revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Proxim |model=8555 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |manuf=Samsung |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF800A-70-4C-EK |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4F151612C-TC60 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial=DE-9,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-300 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=LevelOne |eth_chip2_model=LXT970AQC |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=RangeLAN |default_ssid_regex=^RangeLAN$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=public |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth= }} The device uses a ''RangeLAN-DS PC Card'' for the wireless module. :It will also work with a [[Proxim Harmony 8430]] (same [[Z-Com XI-300|parent OEM product]]). This device is highly similar in appearance to the [[Samsung SWL-3000AP]] and appears :to share the same serial configuration interface. ''Samsung'' is the presumed OEM. The CPU is part S3C4510X01-QERO. There is a ''Lattice'' ispLSI5256VA on-board. "REV:AP3000B" and "2000.05.23" is silkscreened on the board. :This device has no web configuration interface. The power adapter included with the device is a :'''Ault''' Model PW 107 KA0502F02 (5V, 1.5A). ===Serial=== The default password for the serial console is '''public'''. ====Boot log==== 
        AP Firmware version : 1.02
        Checksum OK
        Loading firmware

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        To configure the Access Point, the password is required.
        Enter password:

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        To configure the Access Point, the password is required.
        Enter password:******

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        [ ROOT ]
              1. Basic                 [Menu]
              2. Advanced              [Menu]
              3. Server                [Menu]
              4. Status                [Menu]
              5. Load default values
              6. Save and reboot

        CMD(t,p,h):
